## Source: ossf-package-analysis (130fd52e3cbddff7262a9282d5b1c5967b6550526f9ef981b603301f144810fc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'google-protobuf-conformance' @ 9.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
